doc.field: DANISH UNEMPLOYMENT FALLS TO 7.8 PCT IN FEBRUARY

- Denmark's seasonally adjusted unemployment rate fell to 7.8 pct of the workforce in February from 7.9 pct in January, against 7.9 pct in February 1986, the National Statistics Office said. The total number of unemployed in February was 213,200 against 215,700 in January and 216,600 in February, 1986.
